hadiths.text: Abu Heraira reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:Do not take vows, for a vow has no effect against Fate; it is only from the miserly that something is extracted

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنِ النَّذْرِ، وَأَنَّهُ، لاَ يَرُدُّ شَيْئًا
chapter.eng-name: he Prohibition Of Vows, And Confirmation That They Do Not Avert Anything
